LanguageData.EggCrawelerUnfertilized.label: crawler egg (unfert.)
LanguageData.EggCrawelerUnfertilized.description: Unfertilized crawler egg. It can be eaten raw, but it's much, much better cooked.
LanguageData.EggCrawlerFertilized.label: crawler egg (fert.)
LanguageData.EggCrawlerFertilized.description: Fertilized crawler egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a baby crawler. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.
